text: The Wind that Shakes the Barley is a 2006 Irish British war drama movie. Ken Loach directed the movie. Cillian Murphy, Liam Cunningham, Roger Allam, Orla Fitzgerald, Pádraic Delaney, Seán McGinley, William Ruane starred in it.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2006 drama movies Category:2000s war movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:British war movies Category:British drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama movies Category:Swiss drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Loach Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in Ireland
title: The Wind that Shakes the Barley
